title: Touratur.id
description: A company profile website for Touratur.id, a travel company that operates in the tourism industry. It highlights destinations and services to make exploring easier and more exciting.

title: Clinic Data Center
description: A web app project built to digitalize clinic data management for an internal company clinic. Designed to simplify access and organize healthcare information more efficiently.

title: Aplikasi POS | Karya Hutama Oxygen
description: A point-of-sale app made to support Karya Hutama Oxygenâ€™s trading business. Helps manage sales, transactions, and daily operations in a more practical way.

title: Academate
description: A mobile app that help students to rent a mentor for their study. It connects students with mentors to facilitate learning and academic support.

title: Cek Gudang
description: A web app that helps users to check the availability of goods in a warehouse. It provides a user-friendly interface for inventory management and stock checking.
